## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                 | Type                                | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | It defines name of the icon | `string`                            | `'pencil'` |
| `size`   | `size`    | It defines size of the icon | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `'m'`      |
